caption: This children's song features truck sounds. This is accompanied by a keyboard playing a melody using a flute-like sound. A twinkling melody is played in the background. The percussion is programmed. The percussion plays a simple beat. The bass plays the root and fifth notes of the chords. The mood of the song is happy. There are no voices in this song. This song can be used in a children's animated movie.
